title: Skies Made Strange Hub
content:

[[=image skies-made-strange.gif style="border: 2px solid grey;"]]
[[div style="center no-repeat ; float: center; border: solid 2px #000000; padding: 1px 5%; margin: 10px 10% 10px 10%; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);background-color: #eaeaea;"]]
{{This is Mobile Task Force Alpha-2, transmitting in the blind to Overwatch Command.}}

{{Memetic agent AMARANTH NIHIL has been successfully deployed. Civilian uptake has been generally positive thus far. Only minor side effects have been reported, and violent rejection is rare.}}

{{Projections indicate that the agent will be present in the entirety of civilian humanity within 48 hours. This can be accelerated if it becomes necessary.}}

{{Please notify us if you have received this or any of our previous transmissions.}}
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[div style="center no-repeat ; float: center; border: solid 2px #000000; padding: 1px 5%; margin: 10px 10% 10px 10%; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
